page.title: 07Clubs
page.content: There is one pub in the village it is called the Crown Inn it is 350 years old. The owners are Ken and Linda Carlton. There is the modern working mens club. The village Hall is built of wood and now has a brick exstention. The village Hall was built in 1932 it was used for lots of things Christmas Plays,Christmas Fares,Rainbow Club, Play Group,Olde Tyme Music Hall, Womens- Institute,Jumble Sales and Youth Club.The playgroup meet twice a week,and there are about 20 children in it.The Rainbow Club meets every fort- night,consisting of all the older members of the village.There are two youth clubs,one for age 7 to 11,and one for age 12 and over.They meet every week.Mr.Cox is the careaker of the Village Hall.
